detail.fieldTitleHelpTextActive: If active, manufacturer will be displayed.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalName: The internal name is needed for display in the administration.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalId: The internal ID is needed for display in the administration, imports and API connections.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalNote: The internal note is required for display in the administration.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextPriority: The higher the priority, the further forward the manufacturer is ranked in the display.
detail.manufacturerNote: If filled, these fields have a higher priority than the GPSR information at the manufacturer (Catalogues > Manufacturer > GPSR Information) and at the products (Catalogues > Products > GPSR Information)
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextSalesChannel: OR link: The display takes place if at least one of the assigned sales channels applies. If no sales channel is added, the display always takes place.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextProductStream: OR link: The manufacturer is displayed for all products in the dynamic product groups.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextRule: OR link: The display takes place if at least one of the assigned rules is true. If no rule is added, the display always takes place.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextHeadline: If no text is entered here, the following text snippet is automatically used: "acrisGpsr.gpsrHeadline"
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextDisplayType: If the option â€™In GPSR tab' is selected, the information from manufacturers, responsible persons and the warning/safety notes are loaded in one tab, provided they have also selected the GPSR tab option.
detail.fieldTitleTabLink: The following snippet is used for the tab text: acrisGpsr.gpsrTabManufacturer
detail.fieldTitleGpsrTabLink: The following snippet is used for the tab text: acrisGpsr.gpsrTab
detail.fieldTitleModalText: Info text for opening the modal window
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextModalText: If no text is entered here, the following text snippet is automatically used: "acrisGpsr.gpsrModalInfoText"
detail.fieldTitleModalLinkText: Link text for opening the modal window
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextModalLinkText: If no text is entered here, the following text snippet is automatically used: "acrisGpsr.gpsrModalLinkText"
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextSeparator: If active, a separator line is displayed between the manufacturer instructions.
detail.cardManufacturerTitle: Details of the manufacturer (information obligations under the GPSR Product Safety Regulation)
detail.manufacturerHint: Each product offer in online trade must contain the name, the registered trade name or the registered trade mark of the manufacturer of the offered product as well as the postal address and an electronic address (e-mail address or URL of a website) of the manufacturer at which the manufacturer can be contacted.
detail.cardContactTitle: Details of the responsible person in the EU (information obligations under the GPSR Product Safety Regulation)
detail.contactHint: If the manufacturer of the product offered does not have a branch in the European Union (EU), online retailers must also provide the name, postal address and an electronic address (e-mail address or website URL) of the so-called responsible person within the meaning of the GPSR or in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2019/1020 on market surveillance and product conformity in the product offers affected by this - in addition to the above manufacturer information.
detail.messageSaveError: The manufacturer could not be saved.
